page.title: 06Army & Civilian Facilities
page.content: On our {civilian}estate we can play football, rounders, baseball and go to Sunday school we can go to church.The playparks have swings, see-saws ,baby swings and slides.We have 4 shops Crosbys,Lavals,the chemist and the CO OP.We have a doctors near us some of my friends go to Cubs.We have two infants schools, two juniors schools one senior school. On our{army}estate I can play on the} play parks.The play park I play in has got two sets of swings. A baby pair with safetyrs across the swings. The other swings are just open swings. There is a very high slide and two see-saws. There's a playing-field near by with a{BMX}course on it. When I go} for sweets I usually go to the{NAFFIE. Near by there's a garrison swimming pool I don't go there much.
